headline: PG&E Reaches Significant Undergrounding Milestone, Burying More Than 800 Miles of Lines in High Wildfire-Risk Areas
summary: Pacific Gas and Electric Company (PG&E) announced today that it has constructed and energized more than 800 miles of underground powerlines since launching its wildfire safety undergrounding effort in 2021.
